message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1200000 to you, and I believe it could be a game-changer for your endeavors. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $1150000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit while securing a transaction that aligns with our mutual interests. Please let me know if you require any further information or if we can discuss this further.
